title: Retro, Bold, Italicized, Serif With "R" Falling Under Baseline
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145617im_/http:/typophile.com/files/81251_4031.jpg)
  
Hi I'm trying to find something similar to this font. In particular, I'm trying to find a typeface with that sort of falling R while still holding that bold serif look.  
The closer the better.  
Many thanks in advance,

Font: 

 Royal Acid 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145617/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: frank2630

comments.content: **[Royal Acid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145617/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Royal%20Acid%20-%20Regular%20Italic&fid=3163d9fee7327fc0428b67b459bd727a&fsize=60&text=A%20Royale%20With%20Cheese&fit=1)** by Dennis Ludlow (2001, Free for personal use)
